title: Sentimental
lyrics:
Neoleul cheom bon sungan geunal ihulo
Meolis-sog-i mwonga eomcheong bogjabhae
Ileomyeon an doeneunde
Amugeosdo son-e jabhijil anhgo eojileowo
Ileon nae moseub-i nado nachseol-eo

Halu onjong-il gidalim-ui yeonsog

Amu ildo eobsneunde

Gibun-i wassda gassda

Senchihadan ge ileon geonga sip-eo



Oneul haluneun eottaess-eo?

Nalssiga kkwaena gwaenchanh-ass-eo

Salamdeul-i da

Nolleo gago sipdago

Geuleodeola



Naui haluneun jom geulaess-eo

Ontong ne saeng-gagppun-ieossgo

Eodil gado

Dulibeongeoligiman

Hago iss-eul ppun-ieoss-eo



Teugbyeolhi yagsog han geosdo aninde

Halu onjong-il yeonlagman gidalyeo

Ileomyeon an doeneunde

Mwoleul haedo ma-eum-e deul-eoojil anhgo seulpeo



Ileon nae moseub-i nado nachseol-eo

Seog-yangman bwado nunmul nalgeos gatgo

Amu ildo eobsneunde

Gwaenhi oeloun geos gatgo

Senchihaejindan ge mwonji aldeushae



Oneul haluneun eottaess-eo?

Nalssiga kkwaena gwaenchanh-ass-eo

Salamdeul-i da

Nolleo gago sipdago

Geuleodeola



Naui haluneun jom geulaess-eo

Ontong ne saeng-gagppun-ieossgo

Eodileul gado

Dulibeongeoligiman

Hago iss-eul ppun-ieoss-eo



Eodil gado geulium-ui yeonsog-il ppun

Nan eodil gado ne saeng-gagman gadeughal ppun



Oneul haluneun eottaess-eo?

Naega bogo sipjin anh-ass-eo?

Salamdeul-i da

Yeon-aehago sipdago

Geuleodeola



Naui haluneun jom geulaess-eo

Ontong ne saeng-gagppun-ieossgo

Eodil gado

Dulibeongeoligiman

Hago iss-eul ppun-ieoss-eo



Eodil gado geulium-ui yeonsog-il ppun

Nan eodil gado ne saeng-gagman gadeughal ppun



Eodil gado geulium-ui yeonsog-il ppun

Nan eodil gado ne saeng-gagman gadeughal ppun
